questions.question: What is the virtual DOM in React?
options: A virtual representation of the browser's DOM
The actual DOM tree structure
A backup of the DOM
A lightweight version of the DOM
questions.answer: A virtual representation of the browser's DOM

questions.question: What is JSX in React?
options: JavaScript XML
JSON XML
JavaScript Syntax XML
Java XML

questions.question: What function is used to change the state in React?
options: this.setState()
this.modifyState()
this.changeState()
this.stateChange()

questions.question: What is the purpose of the `children` prop in React?
options: To pass the data from one component to another
To render the content inside a component
To manage the lifecycle of a component
To handle user events in a component
questions.answer: To render the content inside a component

questions.question: What is the main purpose of React components?
options: State management
UI components
Event handling
Data fetching

questions.question: What is the `setState` function in React?
options: A function to change the state in React
A function to fetch data in React
A function to render the content in React
A function to handle user events in React
questions.answer: A function to change the state in React
